snippet: Mr. Kurien helped thousands of dairy farmers create cooperatives to produce and market milk, reducing hunger and poverty and eventually transforming India into the world’s largest milk producer.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Kurien helped thousands of dairy farmers create cooperatives to produce and market milk, reducing hunger and poverty and eventually transforming India into the world’s largest milk producer.

headline.seo: Verghese Kurien, 90, Who Led India’s Milk Cooperatives, Dies
headline.main: Verghese Kurien, Leader of India’s Milk Cooperatives, Dies at 90
headline.print_headline: Verghese Kurien, 90, Leader Of India’s Milk Cooperatives
